data.description: DBI wrapper to Do What I Want (DWIW)
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Err, this module has been out for quite a while, I just forgot to
    register it. Many folks are happily using it and bugs are promptly
    fixed.

    The real rationale was to create a layer on top of DBI that added
    simplicity, DSN management, and a bit more fault-tolerance.
